Mary's choice declared in a sermon preached at the funeral of the Right Honourable Lady Mary Wharton, late wife of the Honourable Sir Thomas Wharton, Knight of the Bath, at Edlington in the county of York together with a narrative of the religious and holy life, and death of that excellent lady / by P.W., Rector of Edlington. P. W. (Peter Watkinson), d. 1688.
[6], 46 p.
Printed by Robert White, for Henry Mortlock ..., London : 1674.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library. Includes bibliographical references.
=======
